channel.title: Bootstrappability Builds
channel.description: It should be ideally possible to build up your OS from source code. I think this is can be possible, if the OS will be by default with minimal core packages (system level). [[More info](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Dev/bootstrappable_builds)]

item.title: Bootstrappability Builds

item.description:
It should be ideally possible to build up your OS from source code. I think this is can be possible, if the OS will be by default with minimal core packages (system level). [More info]
